mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(a.writetime,"%Y-%m") as time ,user, CONVERT(SUM(CASE a.type WHEN 32 THEN a.flow ELSE 0 END)/1024,DECIMAL(10,2)) as up, CONVERT(SUM(CASE a.type WHEN 35 THEN a.flow ELSE 0 END)/1024,DECIMAL(10,2)) as down, b.User_Name as userName from xhgmnet_esight_traffic_monitor_hour as a LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_user_access_list as b on a.`user`=b.User_Ip where DATE_FORMAT(a.writetime,"%Y-%m")=#{time} GROUP BY a.`user`
